title: With the release of Mecha Zero Sion, can we finally get a themed recal for Mecha Kha?
body:
As title says. Please Riot, it wouldn't take you guys much work to just modify Mecha Kha'Zix recall animation to something similar to his other brothers. 

Suggestions:
Helicopter
Rocket(ship)
Some kind of speedy land vehicle

Kha'Zix skin feels very odd when compared to the other skins. You could rerelease him or make some kind of event similar to the Project event where if you buy him during the event you get the free loading frame.

Also is there any kind of special animation for the release of Mecha Zero Sion? Like the Project trailer?

replies.body: Autocorrect corrected Sion to Soon in the title....
Thus is the true power of KateyKhaos shown.

Hiya Necrolegion89, 

Animations, especially recalls, take around two weeks to complete, potentially longer if we're adding sound effects and particles. That time would be taken away from newer skins, which would mean less cool bells and whistles. 

At this time, we won't have plans to update Mecha Kha'Zix's recall animation. That said, you do have some cool ideas that we could potentially consider in the future, if we did some kind of reboot. :D
It's on our list! You're right, this was caused by the resize. The particles around the claws are pretty finicky. Lemme take a look and see where we're at.

Now if there was an update to his themed recall later on, and I'm just throwing an idea out, maybe a sports car animation? I get that his textures maybe wouldn't translate well but with his color scheme on his claws and wings would look  sick.

Thank you for considering it. Mecha Kha needs a little love to fit with the other mechas.

I think the deal with mecha kha'zix that sets him apart from the other mechas is that he's literally a shape shifter, instead of having a static transformation he actually has adaptive machinery that fits within his base skins' more biological theme. I think it's a cool, if a bit unintentional flip on the standard mecha skin line, instead of having A transformation he is THE transformer, into anything you could need in a specific situation.

This "adaptive combat chassis" is probably one of the "bells and whistles" Sion insults the later mechas for.
